name: nmcnc
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))

stmt.origin: sseldi(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3), co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr)), wcel(c0, cnv))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
-| wss(co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr)), co(c2, ccn, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
-| wss(co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr)), co(c2, ccn, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr))))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wss(co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr)), co(c2, ccn, c3)), wcel(c3, ctop))

body.origin:
|- wss(co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr)), co(c2, ccn, c3))
-| wcel(c3, ctop)
-| wi(wcel(c3, ctop), wss(co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr)), co(c2, ccn, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr))))
-| wcel(c3, ctop)
-| wi(wcel(c3, ctop), wss(co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr)), co(c2, ccn, c3)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c3))
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(c2[Cn](c3[|`t]ℝ)))
⊣ c3 ∈ Top
⊣ (c3 ∈ Top →(c2[Cn](c3[|`t]ℝ))⊆(c2[Cn]c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr))))
-| wi(wcel(c3, ctop), wss(co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr)), co(c2, ccn, c3)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c3))
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(c2[Cn](c3[|`t]ℝ)))
⊣ (c3 ∈ Top →(c2[Cn](c3[|`t]ℝ))⊆(c2[Cn]c3))
⊣ c3 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c3, ctop), wss(co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr)), co(c2, ccn, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr))))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c3))
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(c2[Cn](c3[|`t]ℝ)))
⊣ c3 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)

stmt.origin: nmcvcn(c0, c1, c2, co(c3, crest, cr), c4)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, co(c3, crest, cr))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cims, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c4))
-| wceq(co(c3, crest, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(c2[Cn](c3[|`t]ℝ)))
⊣ c1 =(normCV ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(IndMet ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(MetOpen ` c4)
⊣ (c3[|`t]ℝ)=(topGen ` ran((,)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cims, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c4))
-| wceq(co(c3, crest, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c3))
⊣ c3 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
⊣ c1 =(normCV ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(IndMet ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(MetOpen ` c4)
⊣ (c3[|`t]ℝ)=(topGen ` ran((,)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c3, crest, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
-| wceq(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), co(c3, crest, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cims, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c4))
-| wceq(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), co(c3, crest, cr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c3))
⊣ c3 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
⊣ c1 =(normCV ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(IndMet ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(MetOpen ` c4)
⊣ (topGen ` ran((,)))=(c3[|`t]ℝ)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), co(c3, crest, cr))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cims, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c4))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(c2[Cn]c3))
⊣ c3 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
⊣ c1 =(normCV ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(IndMet ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(MetOpen ` c4)

comment: The norm of a normed complex vector space is a continuous function to ` CC ` . (For ` RR ` , see ~ nmcvcn .) (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
